attributes.action: Create a National Concession Card for the under 18s
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This card will entitle the under 18s to travel on public transport for free on off-peak times. This not only allows them to travel to schools for free but allows them to go ANYWHERE in their area for free.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Create a National Concession Card for the under 18s."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20200


Prime Minister's Office
